data.actual_result: The message is edited but the same message stays in the message base and you can send it again
data.expected_result: The message is edited and the message base is left blank
data.short_description: Edited message stays and you can send it twice
data.steps_to_repro: - Send a message starting in potrait move - Long press and click "Edit" - Switch to landscape mode then back to potrait - Add something to the edited message and send it
